name: TOGETHERNESS: Burn The House Down
description:
"What did you say to me on  that evening? Those words will plague me for Eternity. But all we have is the Eternity, us...  Together." 

...Tell me. Have you ever made something? Were you proud of it? Did you regret your creation, casting it aside shameful of your incompetence? At least, in the end... You were granted the satisfaction of witnessing its completion.

ELEMENTS OF THIS GAME:
  • Slight bloodyimagery
    • Blood, imagery of veins, organs etc
  • Implications of Abuse
    • Manipulation, physical violence, Psychological torture
  • Heavy messages of the above aspects

!!! ANY CONCERNING TOPICS MENTIONED ABOVE ARE NOT OF EXTREMELY DISTURBING QUALITY, BUT THIS GAME DOES DELVE INTO EXAMPLES OF TOXIC BEHAVIOR AND SUCH. 

If you are a Youtuber or any sort of Content Creator and will include my game in a video please contact me first... Discord is Ferris#7938 or Twitter is Ttchtone, Thank you
